SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE_GETID_FORDESCRIPTION
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE codetable ID for a given description.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE_GETID_FORDESCRIPTION( @codeDescription nvarchar(100) ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin -- do work here and return a value declare @ID uniqueidentifier; set @codeDescription = LOWER(@codeDescription)
select @ID = ID from dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE where LOWER([DESCRIPTION]) = @codeDescription
return @ID; end
